mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from time_place
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into time_place (course_id, week_day, class_no, place) values (#{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{weekDay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{classNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into time_place
course_id,
week_day,
class_no,
place,

update time_place
course_id = #{record.courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
week_day = #{record.weekDay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
class_no = #{record.classNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
place = #{record.place,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update time_place set course_id = #{record.courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, week_day = #{record.weekDay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, class_no = #{record.classNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, place = #{record.place,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
